item.description:
Change of plans. To make this the most fun, the class will focus on all of the large movements in Laojia Yilu:


  • Walking Obliquely
  • Wave Hands like Clouds
  • Part the Wild Horse's Mane
  • Stepping back with arms twirling


Along with the rest of the Accordion Form, this will cover about half of the movements in Laojia Yilu.

Laoshi
item.how_to_find_us: Go up 1 flight of stairs and turn left. We are at the end of the hall in the dance studio.
item.name: Boston Chen Tai Chi Meetup
